Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy.....
You will be the envy of all your friends with this "one of a kind" stylish family home. Offering a comfortable lifestyle of space and quality ideally located within walking distance to the train station, local schools and shops. Just some of the features on hand include: Well-equipped large kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the open plan meals/family area, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, step down formal lounge with cedar lined cathedral ceilings, master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, high ceilings, polished timber floor boards, study/formal dining, oversized carport providing plenty of room for storage of the boat, caravan or trailer.
Step outside to discover a large resort-style backyard featuring a solar-heated pool with an enclosed alfresco area perfect for those who like to entertain all year round on a large allotment of approximately 650m2. All this in a friendly, quiet and secure location, This home really is the complete package. Don't let this opportunity pass you by. This one won't hang around for long. Call now for inspection
Insights: 26 Rokeby Crescent, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Affordable New Beginnings Awaits!
Presented with love & pride, this impeccable home is one that will ignite your excitement. Fabulous decor, a charming colour palette & functional floor plan complements an attractive facade & manicured low-maintenance gardens.
Designed for easy living this low maintenance residence boasts comfort & style that will delight the most fastidious home buyer or investor.
It's smartly configured floor plan comprises a study/second lounge, spacious lounge, a fully equipped kitchen that adjoins spacious open plan meals area which effortlessly links outside to reveal a surprisingly large backyard, fully concreted for convenience. Sleeping quarters including 3 good sized robed bedrooms, huge master with walk-in robe & ensuite, sparkling central bathroom & separate toilet.
Further features include a family sized laundry, a single garage, ducted heating, powerful split-system cooling, high ceilings & so much more! Located to perfection, within close proximity to local shops, bus service & just a hop skip & a jump away from Mt Ridley College.

Description:
Build your dream home on 366m2!
Homebuyers take this great opportunity to secure a prime block of 366m2 approximately to build your dream home. Highlands enjoys a prime location in the heart of Craigieburn only 32km from the Melbourne CBD. Craigieburn has a growing range of medical services while Northern Hospital is less than a 20-minute drive from the community. The many other local facilities include the Newbury Child and Community Centre, Hume Tennis & Community Centre and Highlands Retirement Village. Great location and within walking distance to Parkland, lake, New Craigieburn Town Centre, Craigieburn Global Learning Centre, Schools, so don't miss out on the wonderful opportunity to capture the market in Craigieburn's best locations. Don't wait - this one will not last long!

Description:
Fully packaged family entertainer!
Expressions Of Interest Closing Date 30th March by 6pm.
Set on a 680m2 (approx.) parcel of land, this 4 bedroom home is well designed, with multiple living areas suited for those who love to entertain. Spacious and light filled throughout, the home is perfect for a growing family.
Youll love this magnificent property for:
4- spacious bedrooms including master suite with ensuite and walk in robe. Main bathroom with shower, vanity and bath, servicing the 3 other bedrooms with built in robes.
Large kitchen offers plenty of bench & cupboard space including 900 mm cooktops, with breakfast bar and dishwasher.
Wide and spacious living area or sunroom with access to alfresco,
Electric Roller Shutters.
Block Out Blinds.
Outdoor alfresco area is an entertainer's delight, designed to enjoy with family/friends in all seasons throughout the year.
9.4 x 4.5 meter solar heated swimming pool with roll over pool cover.
1.5 Kw Solar panels.
Zoned off study room.
Double garage with plenty of storage space.
Landscaped picturesque front yard and low maintenance backyard with garden shed.
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
Remote controlled Bosch Home Security.
Other notable features are bay windows boasting character, solar boosted hot water system, garden/storage shed.
In a convenient and family friendly location moments from all major amenities such as Craigieburn Secondary College, Craigieburn South Primary School, Roxburgh Rise Primary School, Craigieburn Gardens, Craigieburn Central, Craigieburn Plaza Shopping Center, Coles, Woolworths, bus stops, Craigieburn Station and much more!
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
Located to Perfection!
Located to perfection, Elevating the concept of luxury living to a whole new level, this truly amazing 4 bedroom family home delivers an unmatched environment of elegance & opulence with its bold architecture, intelligent design & best-of-the-best inclusions from start to finish. Walk up towards its impressive grand facade & enter a home that is sure to impress with its vast living spaces, bright interior & warm family character & charm.
A flexible sun-drenched floor plan offering 4 great sized bedrooms , stunning ensuite & well organised walk-in robe to main, huge living zones with EXTRA DOUBLE DOOR WIDW STORAGE ON PATHWAY TO LIVING ROOM, separate formal lounge which can be used as a 5th bedroom according to the need, brilliant open plan family spaces perfect for large-scale gatherings & state of the art kitchen WITH WALK-IN PANTRY/ 900MM APPLIANCES/ WATERFALL BENCHTOP which needs to be seen to be believed. It hosts an abundance of cupboard & bench space & a sense of luxury for the connoisseur cook.
Step outside & be pleasantly surprised by the homes showpiece entertainers, Immaculous Backyard with flooring in alfresco with a perfect sized lush lawn which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor & outdoor integration.
A short stroll to the local park, schools, Craigieburn Central, transport & jam-packed with quality extras including high ceilings, heightened doors, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, double remote garage, alarm, stunning central bathroom, roomy laundry with great storage & much much more!
Homes like this do not come up often, so call now before it's sold.

Description:
Something for the whole family
This contemporary 4 bedroom, single level home has space for the whole family. Positioned on a large allotment of 584sqm, within the much sought after Highlands Estate, there is something here for everyone.
The main bedroom is situated at the front of the house and includes its own spacious walk in robe and full ensuite. The additional 3 bedrooms are carpeted and all feature built in robes, with the laundry, family bathroom and separate toilet conveniently centrally located.
The hub of the home is the open plan tiled kitchen/dining/living room with doors opening out to a good sized low maintenance rear yard with unlimited potential.
Perfectly positioned within steps of parkland with extensive walking and cycling tracks, minutes from Highlands Shopping Centre and within close proximity to every amenity schools, child care centres, sporting facilities and much more
Additional Property Features-
- Solar hot water with gas instant back up
- Evaporative Cooling
- Ducted Heating
- Lock up double garage with internal access
Appealing to both growing families and investors alike, properties in this location are seldom offered for sale so dont delay, this opportunity wont last long!

Description:
Single-Level Showpiece
Ultimate family living in a premier location with Aitken creek trails & parkland at the end of the street, this stunning home delivers an outstanding lifestyle with its intelligent design & first-class inclusions.
Set on a substantial block of land (approx 539m2) with gorgeous gardens all-round, the home's as-new interior showcases 4 generous bedrooms (master with large walk-in robe & classy ensuite), dedicated study alcove & stylish main bathroom.
Separate living zones include a dedicated theatre room & expansive open-plan family/dining area with bi-fold doors revealing a fabulous outdoor al-fresco entertaining deck. Add to this a gourmet stone-bench kitchen with tiled splashback, premium Smeg appliances & adjoining butler's pantry.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, high ceilings, LED lighting throughout, family-sized laundry, excellent storage spaces throughout, plus an oversized double garage with both internal entry & drive-through option.
Positioned to perfection in one of Craigieburn's most highly coveted pockets, it also offers easy access to the area's new schools, Aitken Hill Primary School & Elevation Secondary College, Volcano Park, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Junction, public transport, sports facilities & much more.
Insights: 6 Dickens Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
A Top Notch Location!
LJ Hooker Craigieburn is proud to present 4 Cavell Drive Craigieburn. Situated in the heart of Craigieburn with Craigieburn Central, Splash Aqua Park and Leisure Centre, Craigieburn Library and public transport a stone throw away, simply leave your car at home.
This charming family home presents a sizable master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, three additional bedrooms with a built in robes serviced by the central bathroom with bath.
When it comes time to spend time with the family take advantage of your well-appointed kitchen showcasing a mirror splashback, 900mm stainless steel appliances and dishwasher which overlooks the living and dining area. For the extra space take advantage of a separate formal lounge.
Step outside and enjoy the sunshine under the alfresco area perfect for those summer days.
This property features ducted heating, split system, alarm and stacks of storage in the double car remote control garage.
Perfectly located with everything at your door step, take advantage of this wonderful opportunity to secure this home. Ideal for many buyers in the market, it wont hang around for long.

Prestige Designer Home With Location To Suit
Be welcomed by this home's impressive classic facade & fastidiously manicured garden & be graced by the homes impressive interior that flaunts a touch of class, style & captivating spaces.
Comprising of 4 bedrooms (oversized master with walk-in robe & en-suite with double vanity & large shower), fully equipped kitchen with stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher & walk in pantry overlooking a large family & meals area accompanied by an extravagant alfresco area ready to entertain family & friends all year round leading to a perfectly manicured backyard.
Journey on through the home to an oversized separate formal lounge room offering plenty of options for the growing family. Add to this a sparkling bathroom, powder room, roomy laundry, double remote garage with internal access, split system cooling, ducted heating & so much more.
This aspirational family home provides the perfect lifestyle in one of Craigieburn's most sought-after-pockets. Centrally located and close by to all of Craigieburn's amenities including local schools, public transport, beautiful parklands and walking trails, Craigieburn Central and the new Splash Aquatic and Leisure Centre this home is well suited for all. This is an amazing opportunity to secure a home that provides for growing families. Be quick as this one won't hang around for long. Inspection is a must !!
Insights: 3 Fairhaven Boulevard, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Entertainer in a Whisper Quiet Location
This exceptional 30sq* residence provides a ready-to-enjoy family lifestyle with its free-flowing design, impressive living/entertaining areas & blissfully quiet cul-de-sac location.
Absolutely immaculate from start to finish, the home's inviting interior highlights a large master bedroom with his/hers walk-in robe & private ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms, sparkling main family bathroom & separate WC.
Oversized formal & informal living zones include an elegant lounge & spacious sun-drenched open family/dining area spilling out to a wonderful decked al-fresco & lush green grass, perfect for your kids to play until their heart's content in complete privacy.
Other stand-out features include; 3-meter feature entry, high ceilings, a well-appointed kitchen with ample cupboard & bench space, dishwasher & deep pantry, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, family-sized laundry, great storage throughout & a double garage with internal access.
Located within a short stroll to three brilliant schools, Mt Ridley College, Mother Theresa & Hume Anglican Grammar, Highlands Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Central, acres of parklands & public transport. If family space & location are high on your buying agenda, then this is the home for you!
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn

Description:
Live At The Centre of Everything
First time offered for sale, much loved cherished over the years & impeccably presented, this proud brick veneer beauty lends itself perfectly to all home buyers & investors alike.
Smack bang, right in the heart of all that Craigieburn has to offer, within moments to Craigieburn Plaza, Craigieburn Central, Primary Schools, Football Oval & public transport, presents a unique & affordable home that will no doubt have you jumping for joy from the moment you step foot inside.
Brilliantly offering the lucky buyer 3 large bedrooms all with great storage, sparkling 2-way central bathroom, separate WC, well-appointed kitchen with an abundance of cupboard & bench space, adjoining meals area & spacious sun-drenched lounge.
Jam-packed with extras such as heating & cooling, ample off-street parking, solid lock up garage & all on a tidy allotment of approx 582m2.
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn

Description:
A Perfect Mix of Modern Style & Absolute Convenience
In a prime position with the best of Highlands virtually at your fingertips, this tri-level townhouse is a must-see for first-time buyers & investors alike with its abundance of natural light, versatile floorplan & quality features throughout.
Perfectly presented from start to finish, the home's impressive interior comprises 2 genuinely large bedrooms (both with full-width mirrored robes), stylish central bathroom with floor-to-ceiling tiles & additional powder room (second WC). Adding to its flexibility is a separate lounge, as well as spacious open-plan living/dining areas complemented by a tastefully-appointed kitchen complete with stainless steel cooking appliances & Bosch dishwasher.
Other highlights include; split-system heating & cooling, additional ceiling fans & panel
heaters (both bedrooms), stone benchtops, solid hardwood floors, double blinds, plus front & rear balconies, concealed laundry facilities & oversized single garage (remote-control) with internal entry.
Moments from Highlands Shopping Centre, Grand Boulevard buses, Malcolm Creek parkland
& endless trails, it's close to some of Craigieburn's most popular schools including Mount
Ridley College, Mother Teresa Catholic Primary School & Hume Anglican Grammar, as well
as easy access to the Hume Freeway. Very impressive!
* Auction held at Highgate Recreation Reserve- 229 Grand Boulevard, Craigieburn
